dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.ctypes

Class Struct

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.ctypes.CType
      • dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.ctypes.ComplexType
        • dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.ctypes.Struct

  • public abstract class Struct
extends ComplexType
    Represents a struct in the C language. Every public field that is an instance of CType is guessed to be a member of the struct. Per convention it is necessary to call init() at the end of the constructor to initialize names and enclosing type of the members. So every member must be created before calling method init(). It is not recommended to reassign members anymore once they are created even if init() is called afterwards. So it is best practice to define each member final until a member should be declared with the volatile modifier in the resulting code generation output.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

      • setMemberSorter

        public final void setMemberSorter(IMemberSorter sorter)
        Sets the member sorter to use for this struct. Setting a member sorter for a struct will override a possible default member sorter for that struct instance.
        Parameters:
        sorter - A new member sorter, maybe null.
